You can enable labels for the colored buttons of the remote.  First, completely exit the app. -- Menu>More>Exit App.  Then edit the "DirecTVRemote.ini" file in the "DirecTV_Remote" folder on your SD card (you may wish to create a backup first).  Locate the line "RGYBLabels": 0, and change the 0 to a 1.  Save the changes and restart the app.  You won' t have to guess between the Red and Green buttons any more!
